## AppRegister.deregisterStyle() method

API for developers to deregister [AppStyles](./foundation-shell.appstyle.md).

**Signature:**

```typescript
deregisterStyle(style: AppStyle): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  style | [AppStyle](./foundation-shell.appstyle.md) | The [AppStyle](./foundation-shell.appstyle.md) to deregister. |

**Returns:**

void

## Example


```ts
getApp().deregisterStyle(someAppStyle);
```
